thread.title: OMG! You Won't Believe Which Bigg Boss Contestant Just Bagged A Film
thread.title_full: OMG! You Won't Believe Which Bigg Boss Contestant Just Bagged A Film

title: OMG! You Won't Believe Which Bigg Boss Contestant Just Bagged A Film
text:
facebook 585 SHARES 
One of the worst - yes we can very well call her that - contestants on Bigg Boss this season has been Priyanka Jagga Muise. She was shown the door by Salman Khan himself, and he even went on record to say that he will never work with Colours Channel again if she is seen in any of their shows. 
Well, looks like Priyanka has managed to use all the negative publicity to her advantage. The reality T.V. contestant took to Facebook to announce her upcoming movie. 
She is also a part of a music video. 
Let's wait and watch how this new career works for Priyanka. 
PS: Check out this picture of her hanging out with fellow contestant, Swami Om.
